name: places/ChIJsVwSMANZwokR-Hy93krtYNo
adrFormatAddress: 801 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10017, USA

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with QBS for the past three years, and I am delighted to share my positive review. Throughout my time here, I have witnessed firsthand the company's commitment to excellence, innovation, and employee satisfaction.
One aspect that truly sets this company apart is its unwavering dedication to fostering a positive work environment. From day one, I have felt supported, valued, and encouraged to grow both personally and professionally. The company's leadership team consistently demonstrates their genuine care for their employees, creating a sense of camaraderie and teamwork that is truly inspiring. Moreover, the company's commitment to innovation is truly commendable. They are always at the forefront of industry trends, constantly seeking new ways to improve processes, products, and services. This forward-thinking approach not only keeps the company ahead of the competition but also provides employees with exciting opportunities for growth and development.
Lastly, I must mention the incredible team I have had the privilege of working with. The company attracts top talent, and the collaborative nature of the workplace fosters a sense of unity and shared goals. I have learned so much from my colleagues and have been consistently impressed by their expertise, dedication, and willingness to go above and beyond. In conclusion, my experience with this company over the past three years has been nothing short of exceptional. From their commitment to employee satisfaction, innovation, and work-life balance, to the incredible team I have had the pleasure of working with, this company truly stands out as a remarkable place to work. I am grateful for the opportunities I have been given and look forward to many more years of growth and success with this outstanding organization.

originalText.text: I started at the company approximately one year ago, after a 35-year career in public service – I couldn’t have asked for a smoother shift. The passion of my coworkers is unparalleled and working with the team makes putting on the suit again purposeful. I would highly recommend both seeking employment at as well as allowing our team to serve you, your property, or firm.

originalText.text:
I have been working for QBS & QPS for about a year and a half now. I really only have great things to say about the company and the location I work for.
I am a Building Supervisor for QBS and one positive aspect, was the opportunity to be trained and work alongside some great supportive, and helpful colleagues as an Area Manager for QPS.
Can truly say this is the best company and location I have worked for in New York.
I can see myself working with this company for many years from now. I love the opportunity to grow and expand my personal work experience within the company.

originalText.text: A great company with opportunities to grow within.  Owner is actively involved in all operations to ensure the company operates like a well oiled machine.  Being a facilities service company, it is a great place to experience the ever-changing landscape of NYC.

originalText.text:
I’m working for QBS for a decade. Started working as cleaner and now I’m on supervisor position.
We learn and grow with QBS.
We have been trained for a lot emergency situations. And when emergency situation happens we are all here for each other and all know who does what. We are working amazing as a team!!!
Hard working and loyal people are treated as valuable with QBS!
God bless QBS!
